meta_description: Art & Heritage of the American West
hours_text:
# Visit the Phippen

#### Hours & Admission

**The Phippen Museum’s normal hours of operation are:**  
**Tuesday – Saturday**  
10AM to 4PM  
**Sundays**  
1PM to 4PM

**Adults** – $12.00

**Seniors (65 +), AAA, Veterans and Active Military** – $10.00

**Students (with ID)** – $6.00

**Members and Children (12 and under)** – FREE

The museum is closed on Mondays, New Year’s Eve at 1PM & New Year’s Day, Christmas Eve at 1PM & Christmas Day, and on Thanksgiving Day. We are also Closed on the Tuesday after the Memorial Day weekend Western Art Show & Sale.

[Tour the Phippen](http://web.archive.org/web/20251110173949/https://phippenartmuseum.org/tours/)

#### Directions & Map

**The Phippen Museum is located seven miles north of downtown Prescott at:**  
4701 Highway 89 North, Prescott, Arizona 86301

#### Plan an Event

**Have your next special event at the Phippen Museum!**

From meals and meetings to presentations and performances, the Phippen Museum has space to accommodate groups both large and small. Your rental includes guest access to the Phippen Museum and use of one of our rooms for the duration of your event. In addition, Museum Docents may be available to provide guided tours for your guests upon request.

For more information, prices or availability, please call the Phippen Museum. (928)778-1385

[Tour the Phippen](http://web.archive.org/web/20251110173949/https://phippenartmuseum.org/tours/)

collections_text:
## [Upcoming Exhibit](http://web.archive.org/web/20260113211759/https://phippenartmuseum.org/upcoming-exhibits/)

[More Info](http://web.archive.org/web/20260113211759/https://phippenartmuseum.org/upcoming-exhibits/)

## [ Exhibits](http://web.archive.org/web/20260113211759/https://phippenartmuseum.org/current-exhibits/)

The Phippen Museums expansive 17,000 sq. ft. space is dedicated to immersive art exhibitions, engaging workshops, special events, and dynamic programming. Step into the Harold & Mitzie James Gallery, home to the Solon H. Borglum Collection, a captivating display showcasing bronze sculptures, paintings, furniture, and other remarkable artifacts from the artist’s life. Explore the Kemper & Ethel Marley Gallery, where visitors can delve into the rich history of the American West in the Bill & Marion Gary Western Heritage Gallery. Here, you’ll find a working chuck wagon and the Arizona Rancher & Cowboy Hall of Fame, offering a glimpse into the iconic cowboy culture. Beyond our permanent exhibits, the museum hosts a variety of rotating displays and engaging art and heritage programs year-round. Join us on a journey of discovery and inspiration at the Phippen Museum.

[Current](http://web.archive.org/web/20260113211759/https://phippenartmuseum.org/current-exhibits/)

## [Phippen Museum](http://web.archive.org/web/20260113211759/https://phippenartmuseum.org/visit-the-phippen/)
